ads.author: Shawn Crowley
ads.title: Vintage 1977 Star Explorer Home Pinball Machine – Model PH 7730 – $500 (Collector Item)
ads.description:
For sale is an original Star Explorer vintage home pinball machine from the late 1970s.
One-owner, well cared for, and still in good working condition.

This is the Phillips/Sentinel home edition, Model PH 7730, which is harder to find complete and intact. Comes with the original owner’s manual, which adds to its collector value! 

Condition
 • Powers on and plays
 • Original artwork still vibrant
 • Some light rust on metal trim from age
 • A few bulbs are out — I attempted to replace them but couldn’t find the correct vintage bulbs
 • Backglass and plastics are uncracked
 • All original hardware

Why it’s collectible
 • Produced in the late 1970s for home use
 • Smaller and lighter than commercial pinball machines
 • Low production compared to arcade units
 • Great for collectors, restorers, or someone wanting a retro display/game piece

Asking $500. Pickup only. Cash Only

ads.author: Brandon Grieve
ads.title: Stern Stranger Things Pinball
ads.description:
FOR SALE: Stern Stranger Things Pro — HUO • Only 559 Plays • Loaded With Extras!

Official Stern Topper, Shooter Rod, Armor, Inner Art Blades, UV Kits Included

Like-New • First Owner • Latest Code Installed

Offering my Stranger Things Pro in like-new condition. I’m the original owner, and this game has lived its entire life in a climate-controlled, non-smoking home. It plays perfectly, looks fantastic, and includes some of the hardest-to-find accessories already installed.

Only 559 total plays, updated to the latest Stern code, and presents exactly as a HUO collector-quality machine should.

Condition

Home Use Only — First Owner

Only 559 total plays

Like new inside and out

Latest code installed

No mechanical issues

Cabinet, playfield, ramps, targets, screens, and mechs all look and function perfectly

This is a clean, collector-level example.

Included + Installed Upgrades

These official Stern accessories are already pre-installed and ready to enjoy:

Official Stern Stranger Things Topper

Official Stern Shooter Rod

Official Stern Cabinet Armor Set

These add tremendous value and visual impact.

Included but Not Yet Installed (Brand new in box)

Stranger Things Inner Art Blades

UV Light Kit(s)

These are some of the most desirable Stranger Things accessories — especially the UV kit for the hidden/invisible ink playfield effects.

Pickup / Shipping

Easy ground-level pickup

Willing to coordinate shipping via STI/Beltmann, Fast Eddie, or your preferred transporter

Price

Asking $7,000
Open to reasonable offers. Willing to consider trades for Avatar CE, Monster Bash LE, Elvira's HOH (40th Anniversary or Blood Red Kiss Edition), Willy Wonka CE, and Wizard of Oz Yellow Brick Road Edition only. But they must be in new or like-new condition. I'm not interested in other trades. Please don't ask. And yes, I realize that I'd have to add cash to the trade.

ads.author: Brandon Grieve
ads.title: Scooby-Doo CE Pinball — HUO, Only 98 Plays!
ads.description:
Scooby-Doo Collector’s Edition Pinball (CE #1189) + Bookcase Topper – HUO – Only 98 Plays — $8,000

Selling my Scooby-Doo Collector’s Edition #1189, home-use-only, smoke-free, and climate-controlled. The game is in excellent condition and plays perfectly.

⭐ Key Details

CE #1189 (limited run of 1,969)

Only 98 total plays

Latest code installed

No mechanical issues

Cabinet & playfield are clean and well cared for

🎁 Includes the Official Scooby-Doo Interactive Bookcase Topper

Motorized sliding bookcase, hidden LCD screen, exclusive topper-only video mode, RGB lighting, custom bookcase sculpt, and full code integration.

🔥 Collector’s Edition Upgrades

CE artwork package, CE powder coat, Creeper armor, Scooby dog-tag launch button, interior art blades, shaker & knocker, RGB speakers, colored wireforms, 16 custom sculpts, and more.

🧼 Minor Cosmetic Notes

Tiny nick in right powder coat

Small art blade tear on left side

Both are very minor (see pics).

🚚 Pickup / Delivery

Easy first-floor pickup.
Can help arrange shipping via Beltmann/STI, Fast Eddie, etc.

💵 Price: $8,000

Open to reasonable offers.

Message me for photos, videos, or a walkthrough.
